text: ql -ya 'ayuha alrswl- llmwmnyn: 'iina faddaltm alaba' walabna' wal'iikhwan walzwjat walqrabat walamwal alty jmetmwha waltijarat alty takhafun edm rwajha walbywt alfarht alty 'aqamtum fyha, 'iina faddaltm dhlk ealaa hubi allah warasulah waljhad fi sabilih fantaziruu eiqab allah wnkalh bkm. wallah la yuafiq alkharjyn ean taeth
